website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and durable. Best suited for larger vehicles. More expensive than others on our shortlist.
pros: Sturdy traction in icy or snowy conditions
cons: Installation takes time and can be confusing
Chains are known to loosen over time

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2xsets (4 chains total) of these for my vehicle, because every now and then these Alaskan winters require a bit more than rubber. I used the provided guide to find the right size and upon testing the fit of these chains I found that they fit perfectly. The chains themselves appear to be constructed well, with no missing or twisted links. They came packaged in a plastic-lined cloth sack, which was inside of a standard box. Would recommend and buy again, as I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my tires- Fitting chart was not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: My tire size (265/70-16) was listed on Glacier Chains fitting chart as being compatible with this product, but the chains were way too big and I was not able to use them. Then I had to pay $16.00 to return them. Disappointed. The product quality seemed acceptable, and I feel like they would have been a good purchase had they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: Good chains,  but the size chart is not right
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the size chart on their website, so I would get the right size. Well they are way to big for my tires... I had to modify them to fit. I have them on my plow truck, and they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: jack morey

customer_reviews.title: Good grip over Hwy 80
customer_reviews.text: Excellent road grip when driving from Lake Tahoe over Hwy 80. Recommend also getting the Quik Grip (QG20074) rubber chain tighners to ensure that the chains are tight and not flapping against your fenders and wheel well
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Rios

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME chains for digging in
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME chains for digging in. They are too heavy to use for hiway or road driving though on my 2005 Tahoe. But I was after something that would plow through any depth of snow, ice or slush with 6,500 lbs of hay and trailer to our hay shed. TRACTOR traction. Perfect for what I was after.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for 285x70x18 tires. Not even close to the right size. They look like they are well built
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Trolla

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Inside hook broke after less than 1/4 mile of easy use. Lucky for me I was driving very slowly and the tensioner pulled the chain off the tire before it could tear up my fender or brake line.
customer_reviews.author: 0u812

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Traction!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new trailer was stuck in snow and mud and 4 wheel drive just wasn't enough. I had 2 sets of these overnighted and headed back up to the mountains a few days later, installed them and I was able to pull my trailer out without even slipping a tire!! This was on a pretty steep muddy and snowy hill. Real life saver!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best insurance I won't be stranded again is being prepared
customer_reviews.text: Unusually large snowfall for our area stranded me so bought these new tire chains. Best insurance I won't be stranded again is being prepared. They appear up for the job but I hope I never have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: tammy l. godbey

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly what I wanted these chains are durable, easy to put on, adjust and fit very well. I found the sizing chart accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra bite in ice and snow
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on my 2wd F150, these things offer great grip and make a 2wd truck go like a 4wd without chains. They fit easy and stay tight with the cam adjusters.
customer_reviews.author: Wslonger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chains
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Do a dry run on installing, the first time is a little complicated. After that no problem,great gripping power.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: With Locking Differential, Bad To The Bone
customer_reviews.text: Have them for my GMC 3500HD 4WD single rear wheel, the truck has locking differential. In 2WD the truck is bad to the bone!
customer_reviews.author: bob clancy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Untried as of yet. Tested them before having to use them and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Barrick

customer_reviews.title: Great chains
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a bumpy ride, but tackles the ice like nothing. I'm highly impressed with these chains.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will do the job. Got them too late in the year to test them on our dirt road.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Easy to install and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I use these every year Elk hunting in the mountains. Snow, Ice, Mud, combination of all these chains are easy to put on and work great. Because of the welded "V" on the cross links if you get a dry or hard section of road they will really shake the truck, But put them in the sloppy Mud and they are all Business!. I would buy again and recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: wired442

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for 275/55/20
customer_reviews.text: I have 275/55/20 tires on my '07 Ford Expedition and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Schutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great chains, wish I had them deer hunting when the snow was 3 ft deep.
customer_reviews.author: bruce greenwald

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the chains are great and would be a benefit in many off road ...
customer_reviews.text: While these chains, H2828SC are listed as Fitting LT265/70 R16 tires they do NOT. Interestingly enough the tire size designation on the bag the chains came in shows tire size LT 265/85 R16. I'm sure the chains are great and would be a benefit in many off road condition; however if they do not fit the tires they are worthless. Just another China screw up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Germano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Before careful if you do not have a high ply tire such as 10-ply as the v-bars can rip up the tire at higher speeds past 20 MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fryett

customer_reviews.text: it is really nice and i love it! but it was almost delivered too late when i needed it and almost missed my trip. cause of cold weather. you guys in Minnesota whould know better and dress warm in winter in minnesota, no brainer. you say when its delivered meet your timing and i deserve tp pay less shipping because i paid more to upgrade faster shipping and it never happened. so i lost shipping money for same price as normal shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pogatchnik

customer_reviews.title: Nice chains, wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Chains I received were the wrong size. Glacier chains sizing chart is wrong
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Love the snow
customer_reviews.text: Have not had to use them yet. But they are well made easy to install. Cam tighteners work well. I will give a updated review as soon as it snows
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mollath

customer_reviews.title: Tough jobs demand tough products
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fits great and their performance is all that I hoped for. With the quality of these chains I can expect many years of high performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chafins

product_meta.title: Glacier Chains H2828SC Light Truck V-Bar Twist Link Tire Chain
product_meta.description: Size:H2828SCGlacier Chains V-Bar Twist Link ladder design combines durable traction, light weight and value for off-road traction. Has tough carbon steel twist link cross chain with welded V-bar. Also has lever end fastener for easy mounting.
feature_bullets: Tough carbon steel twist link cross chain with welded V-bar
Lever end fastener for easy mounting
Great for your truck, van or SUV
Meets all state requirements for traction devices
Comes with locking side-cams to always ensure a good fit
